title: Angular Enum Options Schema
description:
Generates a new, generic enum definition for the given or default project.

为给定或默认项目生成新的通用枚举定义。

name.description:
The name of the enum.

枚举的名称。
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the enum?

path.description:
The path at which to create the enum definition, relative to the current workspace.

要创建的枚举定义的路径。相对于当前工作空间。

project.description:
The name of the project in which to create the enum. Default is the configured default project for the workspace.

要在其中创建枚举的项目的名称。默认是工作区已配置的默认项目。

lintFix.description:
Apply lint fixes after generating the enum.

生成此枚举后，应用 lint 修复程序。
lintFix.x-deprecated:
Use "ng lint --fix" directly instead.

改为直接用 "ng lint --fix"。
